channel.title: Truth Village - Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Truth Village - Recruiting"

item.title: Re: Truth Village - Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, we bought our very own NRF. So that means we now have a chance to be randomly attacked by a Kaiju. As of this posting we do not have any Terri 3 users, so any S3+ players who want to join so that they can minimally attack a Kaiju and get a perm, you may want to apply.

- Aequitas, Kage of Truth

item.title: Re: Truth Village - Recruiting
item.content:encoded: We now have a Jonin Council, 20% PH Discount, as well as bonus stamina at dayroll.

item.title: Truth Village - Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Truth Village - The Village Hidden in Lies has opened up today. If you are looking for a village, feel free to send in an application.
